bwwExcerpt: Here's an idea for a Broadway musical: An awkward boy with an absent father and an overwhelmed mother gets involved with friends in a dubious scheme that spins out of control and almost undoes him. Is it "Dear Evan Hansen"? If only. Alas, "The Lightning Thief: The Percy Jackson Musical" is a pale patch on the earlier show and a failed attempt to board the teenage fantasy-angst train. (See also: "Be More Chill" and, more successfully, "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child.") Based on the popular 200
